name: 郭美純
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Tentative Schedule
1.Orientation
2.Listening/ Speaking Unit 6 Global Connections
3.Reading Unit. 6 Global Connections
4.Reading Unit. 6 Global Connections
5.Listening/ Speaking Unit 7 Language and Communication
6.Reading Unit. 7 Language and Communication
7.Reading Unit. 7 Language and Communication
8.Review
9.Mid-term Exam and Proficiency Test
10.Listening/ Speaking Unit 8 Tastes and Preferences
11.Reading Unit. 8 Tastes and Preferences
12.Listening/ Speaking Unit 9 New Frontiers
13.Reading Unit. 9 New Frontier
14.Listening/ Speaking Unit 10 Ceremonies
15.Reading Unit. 10 Ceremonies
16.Reading Unit. 10 Ceremonies
17.Review
18.Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
A:輔導課程35%
　　-　　期中成績30% (課文、聽力與寫作)
　　-　　期末成績30% (課文、聽力與寫作)
　　-　　出缺席率20%
　　-　　課堂表現20% (小考、口說練習、討論、作業等)
B:正規課程35%
　　-　　期中成績30% (課文、聽力與寫作)
　　-　　期末成績30% (課文、聽力與寫作)
　　-　　出缺席率20%
　　-　　課堂表現20% (小考、口說練習、討論、作業等)
B:期中會考15%
C:期末會考15%
PS. 期中考試、期末考試必到；課堂考試。
materials:
1.　　Interactions 2 Reading, Silver Edition by Elaine Kirn & Pamela Hartmann
2.　　Interactions 2 Listening/Speaking, Silver Edition by Elaine Kirn & Pamela Hartmann
3.　　Assigned supplemental materials.
